Hot Spot/Groove/Blades/First Aid/Streetwise/Firestarter:





Hot Spot sat in the command chair of the battlecruiser, the Dimentia.  

"Alright, Maximals, if we see ANY resistance, we have orders to leave.  We've 
lost to many people.  We want to know what the slag happened to the 
Cybertronian Fire and Commander Kluster.  Groove, keep scanning."

"Yes, sir." Groove replied.

Hot Spot looked to the four other Protectobots, and the five other Maximals 
on the bridge.  

"Hot Spot!  There's something closing in!"

"Hail them."

"No response."

"Streetwise, open fire on them.  They obviously aren't going to attack."

"I don't see it...and scanners can't pinpoint its location."

"Slag it!  Earth is only a little ways away, go at full speed for it.  Keep 
an eye out for any tricks."

===

Firestarter sat in the only seat of the Decepticon Talon-Class fighter.  Its 
hull resisted most scanners, and its weapons and shields were suburb, mixed 
with millions of years of Autobot and Decepticon technology.

"Prepare to die, Autobots." He pressed a button, three laser bolts launching 
out of the tip of the talon shaped fighter.

===

First Aid slammed to the ground as the blasts somehow penetrated the Maximal 
shields surrounding the Dimentia, and cut through the hull.

"Hot Spot!  Hull breaches on all five levels!  Engine room reports we've lost 
transwarp power, as well as interstellar travel.  Weapons are out."

"SLAG!  Get to the esccape pods!  Launch the stasis pods!  Hurry, before that 
ship makes another pass!"

Hot Spot jumped out his command chair and left the bridge, followed by 
Groove, Blades, Streetwise, and First Aid.  They went to the left, while the 
five other Maxis following them went to the right.

They reached the escape pods, and the hatch opened, the five Maximals 
cramming into a small space made for only three Maximals.

The pod launched, heading for Earth.


===

Firestarter saw six escape pods, and flaming battlecruiser.  He launched off 
two plasma missiles, laughing as the battlecruiser blew apart.

"Foolish Maximals..." he chuckled.  Maybe if they had gotten off a barrage of 
missiles and lasers, they could've survived.  But they didn't.  Firestarter 
watched as three escape pods were blown apart by the explosion, one was sent 
hurtling towards the moon, and two were heading for Earth.

He watched fifteen escape pods blow up, only three remaining, heading for 
Earth.

"No so fast..." he laughed, sending his ship straight for the stasis pods, 
and activating activating a tractor beam.

"Unitron and Shockwave, you better be ready, because here I come."
